name: Mirror Mirror
description:
Mirror mirror on the floor...

Who's the bravest of them all?

Traverse through 25 levels of increasing difficulty in a black and white world. Use the left and right arrow keys to move and the up key to jump. Each level is made up of two different levels, the top and the bottom. Although different (sometimes), the two characters are linked together and if one stops the other must as well, if one dies, so does the other.

I lied. It's not fully black and white, but you get my point...
